00056 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 // Limits. These values are required to match the settings Assimp was
00058 // compiled against. Therefore, do not redefine them unless you build the
00059 // library from source using the same definitions.
00060 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

00104 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00126 struct aiFace
00127 {
00130     unsigned int mNumIndices;
00131 
00133     unsigned int* mIndices;
00134 
00135 #ifdef __cplusplus
00136 
00138     aiFace()
00139       : mNumIndices( 0 )
00140       , mIndices( NULL )
00141     {
00142     }
00143 
00145     ~aiFace()
00146     {
00147         delete [] mIndices;
00148     }
00149 
00151     aiFace( const aiFace& o)
00152       : mIndices( NULL )
00153     {
00154         *this = o;
00155     }
00156 
00158     aiFace& operator = ( const aiFace& o)
00159     {
00160         if (&o == this)
00161             return *this;
00162 
00163         delete[] mIndices;
00164         mNumIndices = o.mNumIndices;
00165         if (mNumIndices) {
00166             mIndices = new unsigned int[mNumIndices];
00167             ::memcpy( mIndices, o.mIndices, mNumIndices * sizeof( unsigned int));
00168         }
00169         else {
00170             mIndices = NULL;
00171         }
00172         return *this;
00173     }
00174 
00177     bool operator== (const aiFace& o) const
00178     {
00179         if (mIndices == o.mIndices)return true;
00180         else if (mIndices && mNumIndices == o.mNumIndices)
00181         {
00182             for (unsigned int i = 0;i < this->mNumIndices;++i)
00183                 if (mIndices[i] != o.mIndices[i])return false;
00184             return true;
00185         }
00186         return false;
00187     }
00188 
00191     bool operator != (const aiFace& o) const
00192     {
00193         return !(*this == o);
00194     }
00195 #endif // __cplusplus
00196 }; // struct aiFace

00227 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 struct aiBone
00235 {
00237     C_STRUCT aiString mName;
00238 
00241     unsigned int mNumWeights;
00242 
00244     C_STRUCT aiVertexWeight* mWeights;
00245 
00247     C_STRUCT aiMatrix4x4 mOffsetMatrix;
00248 
00249 #ifdef __cplusplus
00250 
00252     aiBone()
00253         : mName()
00254         , mNumWeights( 0 )
00255       , mWeights( NULL )
00256     {
00257     }
00258 
00260     aiBone(const aiBone& other)
00261       : mName( other.mName )
00262       , mNumWeights( other.mNumWeights )
00263       , mOffsetMatrix( other.mOffsetMatrix )
00264     {
00265         if (other.mWeights && other.mNumWeights)
00266         {
00267             mWeights = new aiVertexWeight[mNumWeights];
00268             ::memcpy(mWeights,other.mWeights,mNumWeights * sizeof(aiVertexWeight));
00269         }
00270     }
00271 
00273     ~aiBone()
00274     {
00275         delete [] mWeights;
00276     }
00277 #endif // __cplusplus
00278 };

00289 enum aiPrimitiveType
00290 {
00296     aiPrimitiveType_POINT       = 0x1,
00297 
00303     aiPrimitiveType_LINE        = 0x2,
00304 
00309     aiPrimitiveType_TRIANGLE    = 0x4,
00310 
00318     aiPrimitiveType_POLYGON     = 0x8,
00319 
00320 
00324 #ifndef SWIG
00325     _aiPrimitiveType_Force32Bit = INT_MAX
00326 #endif
00327 }; 
00328 
00329 // Get the #aiPrimitiveType flag for a specific number of face indices
00330 #define AI_PRIMITIVE_TYPE_FOR_N_INDICES(n) \
00331     ((n) > 3 ? aiPrimitiveType_POLYGON : (aiPrimitiveType)(1u << ((n)-1)))

00346 struct aiAnimMesh
00347 {
00354     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mVertices;
00355 
00357     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mNormals;
00358 
00360     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mTangents;
00361 
00363     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mBitangents;
00364 
00366     C_STRUCT aiColor4D* mColors[AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_SETS];
00367 
00369     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mTextureCoords[AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS];
00370 
00379     unsigned int mNumVertices;
00380     
00384     float mWeight;
00385 
00386 #ifdef __cplusplus
00387 
00388     aiAnimMesh()
00389         : mVertices( NULL )
00390         , mNormals( NULL )
00391         , mTangents( NULL )
00392         , mBitangents( NULL )
00393         , mNumVertices( 0 )
00394         , mWeight( 0.0f )
00395     {
00396         // fixme consider moving this to the ctor initializer list as well
00397         for( unsigned int a = 0; a < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS; a++){
00398             mTextureCoords[a] = NULL;
00399         }
00400         for( unsigned int a = 0; a < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_SETS; a++) {
00401             mColors[a] = NULL;
00402         }
00403     }
00404 
00405     ~aiAnimMesh()
00406     {
00407         delete [] mVertices;
00408         delete [] mNormals;
00409         delete [] mTangents;
00410         delete [] mBitangents;
00411         for( unsigned int a = 0; a < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS; a++) {
00412             delete [] mTextureCoords[a];
00413         }
00414         for( unsigned int a = 0; a < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_SETS; a++) {
00415             delete [] mColors[a];
00416         }
00417     }
00418 
00421     bool HasPositions() const {
00422         return mVertices != NULL;
00423     }
00424 
00427     bool HasNormals() const {
00428         return mNormals != NULL;
00429     }
00430 
00434     bool HasTangentsAndBitangents() const {
00435         return mTangents != NULL;
00436     }
00437 
00441     bool HasVertexColors( unsigned int pIndex) const    {
00442         return pIndex >= AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_SETS ? false : mColors[pIndex] != NULL;
00443     }
00444 
00448     bool HasTextureCoords( unsigned int pIndex) const   {
00449         return pIndex >= AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS ? false : mTextureCoords[pIndex] != NULL;
00450     }
00451 
00452 #endif
00453 };

00477 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00496 struct aiMesh
00497 {
00503     unsigned int mPrimitiveTypes;
00504 
00509     unsigned int mNumVertices;
00510 
00515     unsigned int mNumFaces;
00516 
00521     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mVertices;
00522 
00543     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mNormals;
00544 
00557     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mTangents;
00558 
00566     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mBitangents;
00567 
00573     C_STRUCT aiColor4D* mColors[AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_SETS];
00574 
00579     C_STRUCT aiVector3D* mTextureCoords[AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS];
00580 
00588     unsigned int mNumUVComponents[AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS];
00589 
00596     C_STRUCT aiFace* mFaces;
00597 
00601     unsigned int mNumBones;
00602 
00607     C_STRUCT aiBone** mBones;
00608 
00614     unsigned int mMaterialIndex;
00615 
00627     C_STRUCT aiString mName;
00628 
00629 
00631     unsigned int mNumAnimMeshes;
00632 
00637     C_STRUCT aiAnimMesh** mAnimMeshes;
00638 
00642     unsigned int mMethod;
00643         
00644 #ifdef __cplusplus
00645 
00647     aiMesh()
00648         : mPrimitiveTypes( 0 )
00649         , mNumVertices( 0 )
00650         , mNumFaces( 0 )
00651         , mVertices( NULL )
00652         , mNormals( NULL )
00653         , mTangents( NULL )
00654         , mBitangents( NULL )
00655         , mFaces( NULL )
00656         , mNumBones( 0 )
00657         , mBones( NULL )
00658         , mMaterialIndex( 0 )
00659         , mNumAnimMeshes( 0 )
00660         , mAnimMeshes( NULL )
00661         , mMethod( 0 )
00662     {
00663         for( unsigned int a = 0; a < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS; a++)
00664         {
00665             mNumUVComponents[a] = 0;
00666             mTextureCoords[a] = NULL;
00667         }
00668 
00669         for( unsigned int a = 0; a < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_SETS; a++)
00670             mColors[a] = NULL;
00671     }
00672 
00674     ~aiMesh()
00675     {
00676         delete [] mVertices;
00677         delete [] mNormals;
00678         delete [] mTangents;
00679         delete [] mBitangents;
00680         for( unsigned int a = 0; a < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS; a++) {
00681             delete [] mTextureCoords[a];
00682         }
00683         for( unsigned int a = 0; a < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_SETS; a++) {
00684             delete [] mColors[a];
00685         }
00686 
00687         // DO NOT REMOVE THIS ADDITIONAL CHECK
00688         if (mNumBones && mBones)    {
00689             for( unsigned int a = 0; a < mNumBones; a++) {
00690                 delete mBones[a];
00691             }
00692             delete [] mBones;
00693         }
00694 
00695         if (mNumAnimMeshes && mAnimMeshes)  {
00696             for( unsigned int a = 0; a < mNumAnimMeshes; a++) {
00697                 delete mAnimMeshes[a];
00698             }
00699             delete [] mAnimMeshes;
00700         }
00701 
00702         delete [] mFaces;
00703     }
00704 
00707     bool HasPositions() const
00708         { return mVertices != NULL && mNumVertices > 0; }
00709 
00712     bool HasFaces() const
00713         { return mFaces != NULL && mNumFaces > 0; }
00714 
00716     bool HasNormals() const
00717         { return mNormals != NULL && mNumVertices > 0; }
00718 
00723     bool HasTangentsAndBitangents() const
00724         { return mTangents != NULL && mBitangents != NULL && mNumVertices > 0; }
00725 
00728     bool HasVertexColors( unsigned int pIndex) const
00729     {
00730         if( pIndex >= AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_SETS)
00731             return false;
00732         else
00733             return mColors[pIndex] != NULL && mNumVertices > 0;
00734     }
00735 
00738     bool HasTextureCoords( unsigned int pIndex) const
00739     {
00740         if( pIndex >= AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS)
00741             return false;
00742         else
00743             return mTextureCoords[pIndex] != NULL && mNumVertices > 0;
00744     }
00745 
00747     unsigned int GetNumUVChannels() const
00748     {
00749         unsigned int n = 0;
00750         while (n < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_TEXTURECOORDS && mTextureCoords[n])++n;
00751         return n;
00752     }
00753 
00755     unsigned int GetNumColorChannels() const
00756     {
00757         unsigned int n = 0;
00758         while (n < AI_MAX_NUMBER_OF_COLOR_SETS && mColors[n])++n;
00759         return n;
00760     }
00761 
00763     inline bool HasBones() const
00764         { return mBones != NULL && mNumBones > 0; }
00765 
00766 #endif // __cplusplus
00767 };
00768 
00769 #ifdef __cplusplus
00770 }
00771 #endif 
00772 #endif // AI_MESH_H_INC
